page.title: 01Block Description
page.content: The block lies in North Dartmoor. There is very little habitation here. The {Dartmoor Inn }and a few houses being the sole habitation within the block. The majority of the block therefore consists of rough moorland, dominated in the west by{Brat Tor,}in the North by{Great Links Tor, Rattlebrook Hill to the East, and{Doe and Sharp Tor}to the South. The block is drained mainly by the {River Lydd,}with its tributaries {Doetor Brook}and{Wallabrook. The whole of the block is within the { Willsworthy Gunnery Ranges, consequently the military have a strong presence. The area is beautiful, but wild. This is rough walking country.
